mapper.sql: f.id, f.parent_id AS 'parent.id', fp.name AS 'parent.name', f.parent_ids AS 'parentIds', f.name, f.sort, f.type, f.code, f.area_id AS 'area.id', a.name AS 'area.name', f.address, f.zipcode, f.legal_name AS 'legalName', f.contacts, f.mobile, f.tel, f.charter_url AS 'charterUrl', f.taxation_url AS 'taxationUrl', f.bank_beneficiary AS 'bankBeneficiary', f.bank_code AS 'bankCode', f.bank_name AS 'bankName', f.status, f.remarks
LEFT JOIN sys_area a ON f.area_id = a.id LEFT JOIN sys_franchisee fp ON fp.id = f.parent_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_franchisee f
WHERE f.id = #{id} AND f.del_flag = 0

SELECT f.id, f.name, f.sort, f.address, f.zipcode, f.contacts, f.mobile
FROM sys_franchisee f
WHERE f.del_flag = 0 and f.parent_id !=0
ORDER BY f.code

SELECT
FROM sys_franchisee f
WHERE f.del_flag = 0 AND f.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds} ORDER BY a.code

SELECT f.id, f.parent_id AS 'parent.id', f.parent_ids AS 'parentIds', f.name, f.sort, (CASE WHEN f.type = 1 THEN '直营店' WHEN f.type = 2 THEN '加盟店' END) AS 'type', f.code, f.area_id AS 'area.id', (SELECT NAME FROM sys_area WHERE CODE = a.code AND TYPE = 4) AS 'district', (SELECT NAME FROM sys_area WHERE CODE = LEFT(a.code,9) AND TYPE = 3) AS 'city', (SELECT NAME FROM sys_area WHERE CODE = LEFT(a.code,5) AND TYPE = 2) AS 'province', f.address, f.zipcode, f.contacts, f.mobile, f.tel FROM sys_franchisee f LEFT JOIN sys_area a ON f.area_id = a.id WHERE f.del_flag = 0 AND a.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY f.code

SELECT
FROM sys_franchisee f
WHERE f.del_flag = 0 AND f.parent_id= #{parent.id} ORDER BY f.code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_franchisee ( parent_id, parent_ids, name, type, sort, code, area_id, address, zipcode, legal_name, contacts, mobile, tel, charter_url, taxation_url, bank_beneficiary, bank_code, bank_name, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks ) VALUES ( #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{type}, #{sort}, #{code}, #{area.id}, #{address}, #{zipcode}, #{legalName}, #{contacts}, #{mobile}, #{tel}, #{charterUrl}, #{taxationUrl}, #{bankBeneficiary}, #{bankCode}, #{bankName}, #{status}, #{createBy.name}, SYSDATE(), NULL, NULL, 0, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_franchisee SET name = #{name}, type = #{type}, area_id = #{area.id}, address = #{address}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, legal_name = #{legalName}, contacts = #{contacts}, mobile = #{mobile}, tel = #{tel}, charter_url = #{charterUrl}, taxation_url = #{taxationUrl}, bank_beneficiary = #{bankBeneficiary}, bank_code = #{bankCode}, bank_name = #{bankName}, update_by = #{updateBy.name}, update_date = SYSDATE(), remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_franchisee SET del_flag = 1 WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
